datamodel

Class Delivery

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.Delivery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IObserver, ISubject

    public class Delivery
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubject, IObserver, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a consignment of packages that is being or has been processed by the Fast Courier Service application.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULTCOST
      The Fast Courier Services Default cost per KG shipped.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULTCOST

        public static final double DEFAULTCOST
        The Fast Courier Services Default cost per KG shipped. Individual customers may have different agreed rates but in the absence of any customer specific rate this value is used for a deliveries cost per KG shipped value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Delivery

        public Delivery()
        Default Constructor - Builds a Delivery object with an UNKNOW consignment number for collection on the current date at the default shipping cost. The collection and delivery addresses are unspecified as are the number of packages to collect and the total consignment weight. A Default constructor is required for serialisation

      • Delivery

        public Delivery(java.lang.String consNo,
        int packageCount,
        double weight,
        Address colAddress,
        Address delAddress)
        Constructor to create a Delivery initialised with the provided attributes
        Parameters:
        consNo - - A String being the consignment number to use for this delivery
        packageCount - - An int being the number of packages the driver should collect
        weight - - A double being the total weight of all packages in KG's
        colAddress - - An Address object holding details of where the consignment packages can be collected
        delAddress - - An Address object holding details of where the consignment packages need to be delivered

    • Method Detail

      • appendToNotes

        public void appendToNotes(java.lang.String newNote)
        Accessor method to append a new note to the comma separated notes held about this delivery
        Parameters:
        newNote - - A String containing the note that the driver wishes to append to the deliveries notes

      • getTotalCost

        public java.lang.Double getTotalCost()
        This method retrieves the total cost that the customer will be billed for making this delivery. The cost is defined as the total weight of the deliveries packages * by the deliveries cost per KG shipped.
        Returns:
        - A Double being the total cost to be charged to the customer for making this delivery.

      • registerObserver

        public java.lang.Boolean registerObserver(IObserver o)
        Description copied from interface: ISubject
        This method registers a new observer with the subject. After this method completes successfully the newly registered object will receive notifications to update when the state of this subject object is changed.
        Specified by:
        registerObserver in interface ISubject
        Parameters:
        o - - The object that needs to receive notification of changes to this subjects state
        Returns:
        - Boolean True if the provided object has been added to the list of observers and will receive notification when this subject changes state, False otherwise.

      • removeObserver

        public java.lang.Boolean removeObserver(IObserver o)
        Description copied from interface: ISubject
        This method removes an object from the list of objects receiving notification of state changes to this subject object.
        Specified by:
        removeObserver in interface ISubject
        Parameters:
        o - - The object that no longer needs to receive notification of changes to this subjects state.
        Returns:
        - Boolean True if this object will not receive notification of changes to this subjects state, False otherwise.

        public void notifyObservers()
        Description copied from interface: ISubject
        This method informs all currently registered observers that this subject has changed its state and they need to update as a result.
        Specified by:
        notifyObservers in interface ISubject

      • getStartDate

        public java.util.Date getStartDate()
        Accessor method to retrieve the date when the customer requested collection of this consignment.
        Returns:
        - A Date object representing the date when the customer requested collection of this consignment.

      • getDeliveredDate

        public java.util.Date getDeliveredDate()
        Accessor method to retrieve the date on which the driver made delivery of this consignment.
        Returns:
        - A Date object being the day on which to delivery was made to its destination or NULL if the delivery has not yet reached its destination

      • setDeliveredDate

        public void setDeliveredDate(java.util.Date deliveredDate)
        Accessor method to set the date on which the driver made delivery of this consignment. After this method is called the deliveries status will be DeliveryStatus.DELIVERED
        Parameters:
        deliveredDate - - A Date object being the date on which the driver completed the delivery.

      • getStatus

        public DeliveryStatus getStatus()
        Accessor method to retrieve the current delivery status of this consignment
        Returns:
        - An enumerated value from the DeliveryStatus enumeration.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(DeliveryStatus status)
        Accessor method to set the current delivery status of this consignment
        Parameters:
        status - - An enumerated value from the DeliveryStatus enumeration.

      • getNoOfPackages

        public int getNoOfPackages()
        Accessor method to retrieve the total number of packages being delivered on this consignment
        Returns:
        - An int representing the physical number of packages to be transported

      • setNoOfPackages

        public void setNoOfPackages(int noOfPackages)
        Accessor method to set the total number of packages being delivered on this consignment
        Parameters:
        noOfPackages - - An int representing the physical number of packages to be transported

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        Accessor method to retrieve the total weight in KG's of all packages transported on this consignment
        Returns:
        - A double being the total weight in KG's of all packages transported
